pages.text: The $(d)Floo Token$() allows you to $(3)teleport to any$() $(l:items/floo_sign)Floo Fireplace$(/l) $(3)from anywhere in the world.$().$(br2)Throw it on the ground and wait for the fire to burn in a square. Stand in the square and then speak the name of the Fireplace you wish to teleport to.
pages.title: Floo Token
